title: Cognitive Load Measurement and Effective Instructional Design Strategies in Science Teacher Education

context.prior_knowledge: Basic educational psychology knowledge and experience in diagnosing physics misconceptions
context.additional_context: A science teacher training program for the general public, strengthening cognitive load management skills through problem-solving and example-based learning.

learning_goals: Distinguish and explain the three types of cognitive load (intrinsic/extraneous/germane) with ≥80% accuracy
Improve learning efficiency by 20% using cognitive load assessment scales in physics misconception diagnostic scenarios
Apply instructional design strategies that induce germane cognitive load to real-world cases and propose ≥3 improvement solutions
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
